TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi RichTextBox extends System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase implements class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
Public Class RichTextBox Inherits TextBoxBase Implements IAddChild
type RichTextBox = class inherit TextBoxBase interface IAddChild

summary.span: Represents a rich editing control which operates on objects.

span.span: Represents a rich editing control which operates on objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是唯一支援的子系項目。 is the only supported child element for a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 有內建的反昇處理和事件。 has built-in handling for the bubbling and events. 因此，自訂事件處理常式，接聽`MouseUp`或`MouseDown`事件從永遠不會呼叫。Consequently, custom event handlers that listen for `MouseUp` or `MouseDown` events from a will never be called. 如果您需要回應這些事件，接聽通道和事件相反地，或註冊處理常式取代（這個第二種選項是僅可透過程式碼） 的引數。If you need to respond to these events, listen for the tunneling and events instead, or register the handlers with the argument (this latter option is only available through code). 不會將事件處理，除非您要刻意停用標記原生處理這些事件，並注意這會明顯影響控制項的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。Do not mark the event handled unless you deliberately want to disable native handling of these events, and be aware that this has notable effects on the control's [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 雖然支援複製及貼上的映像，某些情況下目前不支援，而且可能無法正常運作。While supports copying and pasting of images, certain scenarios are currently unsupported and may not work properly. 下表摘要說明這些案例和預期的結果。The following table summarizes these scenarios and expected results. |映像複製來源Image Copy Source|映像貼上的結果Image Paste Result| |-----------------------|------------------------| |影像來源是圖形的中繼檔Image source is a graphic metafile|就會貼上沒有映像No image is pasted| |影像來源會使用相對路徑或連結Image source uses relative path or link|亂碼或空白的映像就會貼上Garbled or blank image is pasted| |映像來源連結 結尾並非預期的影像格式 (。PNG。JPG、。GIF)Image source link does not end with an expected image format (.PNG, .JPG, .GIF)|亂碼或空白的映像就會貼上Garbled or blank image is pasted| |影像來源複製從格式不正確 Rtf (RTF)Image source copied from malformed RichText (RTF)|影像來源的連結就會貼上 （而非映像）Link to image source is pasted (rather than image)| 貼上到的 HTML 內容因為，可能會導致非預期的行為使用 RTF 格式，而不是直接使用 HTML 格式。Pasting HTML content into a might result in unexpected behavior because uses RTF format rather than directly using HTML format. 文字一律會包裝在。Text always wraps in a . 如果您不想文字換行然後將上的寬度大於。If you do not want text to wrap then set the on the to be larger than the width of the . 不過，一旦達到頁面寬度文字仍然會折行。However, once the page width is reached the text still wraps. 水平及垂直對齊內容內透過和屬性。Horizontally and vertically aligning content within a is done with the and properties. 對齊頁面配置中透過和屬性。Aligning the within the layout of the page is done with the and properties. 捲軸不會顯示預設。Scrollbars are not visible on a by default. 若要顯示捲軸，將屬性或。To make a scrollbar visible, set the property to or . 通常，偵測何時應該使用事件中的文字或變更，而不是如您所預期。Usually, the event should be used to detect when the text in a or changes, rather then as you might expect. 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 偵測文字時在文字方塊中已變更](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-detect-when-text-in-a-textbox-has-changed.md)。For an example, see [How to: Detect When Text in a TextBox Has Changed](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-detect-when-text-in-a-textbox-has-changed.md). 支援各種鍵盤命令。 supports a variety of keyboard commands. 如需鍵盤命令的清單，請參閱。For a list of keyboard commands, see . 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下列範例會宣告包含簡單。The following example declares a that contains a simple . [!code-xaml[RichTextBoxSnippets#_RTB_XAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RichTextBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_rtb_xaml)] [!code-csharp[RichTextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#RichTextBoxCodeOnlyExample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RichTextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/CSharp/RichTextBoxExample.cs#richtextboxcodeonlyexample)] [!code-vb[RichTextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#RichTextBoxCodeOnlyExample](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RichTextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/visualbasic/richtextboxexample.vb#richtextboxcodeonlyexample)]
